CustomField.description: Maximum size (in bytes) of email attachments to attach to Activity/Activity's parent. Blank (default) = Allow any attachments (5mb max size) 0 = Do not allow any attachments 1000000 = Allow attachments up to 1mb
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Maximum size (in bytes) of email attachments to attach to Activity/Activity's parent. Blank (default) = Allow any attachments (5mb max size) 0 = Do not allow any attachments 1000000 = Allow attachments up to 1mb
CustomField.label: Maximum Attachment Size
